Text: Fuck. Yes.  I couldn't afford the vinyl back in Jan, will make sure I'm on board for number 2 if they make it.  My requests for a d/l code fell on deaf ears to the guys via twitter etc, thanks to Upprdeck!
yay, was hoping someone would share this eventually. Cheers mate!
Does anyone have the Audible.com bonus podcast?  That's the only one I can't find.  The rest are available.  If someone uploads that, I will make a compilation of all of the bonus content.
